```{r setup, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(here)

photo_info <- read_csv(here("static", "manuscripts", "photo_list.csv"))

data_text <- read_csv("/Users/ulyngs/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Work/stored-oxford-dphil-stuff/UL DPhil at SOCIAM/Output/Academic year 2019-20/OCHS/2020-07-24_website_proof/static/manuscripts/test_text_2/text_test_text_2.csv")

photos <- data_text %>% 
   distinct(photo_id)
```


```{r, include=FALSE}
first_photo <- photos %>% 
   slice(1) %>% 
   pull(photo_id)

first_file_path <- photo_info %>% 
   filter(photo_id == first_photo) %>% 
   pull(file_path)

```

```{r, results='asis'}
cat("<div class='row manuscript-photo-and-text'>")

```
